description: Backup of PID gains for max motor thrust 13.0N (TWR~15.4). Used for all policies trained before 2026-02-14.

position_xy.notes: PID on world-frame XY position error. Small I term assists convergence; rate I term handles the COM bias.

position_z.notes: PID on altitude error with anti-windup (integral clamped to ±1.5)

attitude.notes: Attitude P generates desired body rates: ω_des = (Kp/Kd) * att_error

yaw.notes: Yaw P generates desired yaw rate: ω_des = (Kp/Kd) * yaw_error

rate.notes: Rate PID with I term in torque space (N·m). Converges to ~3.3 mN·m on pitch to compensate COM offset torque (m*g*dx ≈ 3.6 mN·m).

tuning_notes.performance: 100% survival (40/40 episodes), mean reward 414 ± 51. SS position error ~0.006m. SS pitch rate error 0.08 deg/s. err@200=0.28m, err@450=0.12m.
